title: Navy and Gold Advice and Wishes Cards (25 Pack) Perfect Party Activity for Baby Shower, Graduation, Retiree, New Parents, Wedding, Birthday Time Capsule Royal Prince (25 Pack)
features: Advice Cards for Lasting Memories: your guest will love the idea of fill-in the blank advice cards they can personalize for the bride-to-be, baby shower, graduate, bride and groom, birthday boy or girl, retiree or any guest of honor.

Premium Indigo and Gold Party Supplies: 25 pack of advice cards – size 4x4 inches – professionally printed on 120 lb. matte cardstock, which is easy to personalize. Preprinted lines make it easy for everyone at the celebration to write their own customized note of love, congratulations, wishes or advice.

Ready to Use: handout your advice cards with baby shower games – during the bridal shower - as a fun way to start conversations – as part of your table décor. This pack of 25 advice cards are stylish enough to mix in with your other navy blue and gold theme party supplies.

Advice and Wishes Cards: easily impress your guests with a thoughtful activity. The honoree will enjoy this set of keepsake cards and they can easily be stowed away in a memory book or album to for years of enjoyment and a reminder of their special day! (*glitter is a print – mess free)

Created in the USA: we want to help you celebrate with clever paper things made for celebrating family, friendships, life, and love. Our premium party supplies make it easy to do your celebration thing. Printed designs are crafted in the USA, that we hand pack with care in our family-owned business in PA.
description: Advice and wish cards are a great way to share some joy at the celebration you are planning. Everyone loves a thoughtful party idea. With this set of blank advice cards, you can provide a lifetime of lasting memories. Whether family and friends are filling the advice cards in for mommy, new parents-to-be, baby, retiree, graduate, bride and groom or birthday child this set is perfect. This pack of 25 advice cards are easy, convenient, and perfect for handing out at any small or big get together. Each single card can be customized on the blank printed lines. Guests will enjoy writing in their very own wishes, congratulations, or message of love to the guest of honor. Wishes and advice cards are printed on 4-inch x 4-inch-thick card-stock, not glossy prints or thin perforated sheets of paper. The uncoated matte finish is simple to write on with your favorite pen or pencil. At the end of the party the honoree will cherish the keepsake cards. Easily stow away advice cards a memory album or box as a reminder of their special day, enjoying for many years to come.

Favorite Ways to Use: Delight your guests and pair with other games at your baby shower or party. You can easily use advice cards as a conversation starter, part of the table decor, wishing well, time-capsule and more. Advice cards provide a terrific way to get your guests having fun during the baby shower, gender reveal, wedding, retirement party, graduation or any occasion. Paper Clever Party products are designed and manufactured in the USA; you won’t find our advice cards anywhere else. However, you plan to celebrate it, let us help make your event even more fun!
